title: The Circumstances Behind the Dark Lion Earl’s Second Marriage - Novel Updates
tags: Arranged Marriage   European Ambience   Female Protagonist   Nobles   Politics   Royalty
author: Morisaki Asaka   森崎朝香
description:
「You are my fiancee. But, there’s no need to curry favor with me」

Lillimaria, a young daughter of an impoverished noble family, had been chosen as the second marriage partner for an old earl from a remote region.

For the sake of her family, she had prepared herself for the worst and headed to the family she was marrying into, but what awaited her there was a youthful good-looking earl accompanied by a strange-looking lion. Then, the perpetual youth who was possessed by a demon, came to offer her… a marriage arrangement only in paper!?>
